@Phantom_generator_2D/hexplot.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief hexplot plots circles in hexagonal grid
00003 %>
00004 %> @param x0 x position of grid center, (x,0) - center of image
00005 %> @param y0 y position of grid center, (0,y) - center of image
00006 %> @param sizeX x side size of image [mm]
00007 %> @param sizeY y side size of image [mm]
00008 %> @param d diameter of (node) circle
00009 %> @param D node size
00010 %> @param ang1 grid rotation
00011 %> @param mode 'polar' plots all circles with polar coordinates
00012 %>             'cart'  plots all circles with carthesian coordinates
00013 %>             'index' plots all circles with index
00014 %>             'rods'  plots rods
00015 %>             'rods2' plots all circles and rods
00016 % =====================================================================
00017 function hexplot(phobj,x0,y0,sizeX,sizeY,d,D,ang1,mode,indx)
00018 
00019 fsize = 9;
00020 
00021 % calculate hexagonal grid of rods (holes)
00022 [x y w h a r] = phobj.hexgrid(x0,y0,sizeX,sizeY,d,D,ang1,0);
00023 
00024 % draw big circle - FOV of sensor
00025 phobj.circle(x0, y0, sizeX);
00026     
00027 % draw all holes with description - position in polar system (r,a)
00028 if strcmp(mode,'polar')==1
00029     for i=1:length(x)
00030         phobj.circle(x(i), y(i), w(i));
00031         [str err] = sprintf('%5.1f,%5.1f', r(i), a(i)*180/pi);
00032         text(x(i),y(i), str,'HorizontalAlignment','center','FontSize',fsize);
00033     end
00034 end
00035 
00036 % draw all holes with description - position in carthesian system (x,y)
00037 if strcmp(mode,'cart')==1
00038     for i=1:length(x)
00039         phobj.circle(x(i), y(i), w(i));
00040         [str err] = sprintf('%5.1f,%5.1f', x(i), y(i));
00041         text(x(i),y(i), str,'HorizontalAlignment','center','FontSize',fsize);
00042     end
00043 end
00044 
00045 % draw all holes (position on the list)
00046 if strcmp(mode,'index')==1
00047     for i=1:length(x)
00048         phobj.circle(x(i), y(i), w(i), '--b','--b');
00049         [str err] = sprintf('%3.0f', i);
00050         text(x(i),y(i), str,'HorizontalAlignment','center','FontSize',fsize);
00051     end
00052 end
00053 
00054 if strcmp(mode,'rods')==1 || strcmp(mode,'rods2')==1
00055     if strcmp(mode,'rods2')==1
00056         for i=1:length(x)
00057             phobj.circle(x(i), y(i), w(i), '--b','--b');
00058         end
00059     end
00060     % draw six rods with description
00061     for k=1:length(indx)
00062         i = indx(k);
00063         phobj.circle(x(i), y(i), w(i), '-k','k');
00064 
00065         [str err] = sprintf('%5.1f,%5.1f', r(i), a(i)*180/pi);
00066         text(x(i),y(i)-h(i), str,'HorizontalAlignment','center','FontSize',fsize);
00067     end
00068 end
00069 
00070 drawnow;
00071 set(gca,'PlotBoxAspectRatio',[1,1,1]);
